titleStmt.title: The true copies of the letters betwene the reuerend father in God Iohn Bisshop of Sarum and D. Cole vpon occasion of a sermon that the said Bishop preached before the Quenes Maiestie, and hir most honorable Counsel. 1560. Set forthe and allowed, according to the order appointed in the Quenes Maiesties iniunctions. Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis per septennium.
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.

titleStmt.title: The true copies of the letters betwene the reuerend father in God Iohn Bisshop of Sarum and D. Cole vpon occasion of a sermon that the said Bishop preached before the Quenes Maiestie, and hir most honorable Counsel. 1560. Set forthe and allowed, according to the order appointed in the Quenes Maiesties iniunctions. Cum gratia & priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis per septennium.
titleStmt.author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
Cole, Henry, 1500?-1580. aut

notesStmt.note: "The copie of a sermon pronounced by the Byshop of Salisburie at Paules Crosse, the second Sondaye before Ester in the yere of our Lord. 1560" has divisional title; foliation and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
